Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the shoulder and neck of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394029) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394029)
